title: New Blood Moon skins coming, guess who won't get one

replies.body: I expected {{champion:131}}

> Blitzcrank is a robot, so you can't make a robot a robot

I think we have the technology
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/d75f03203cc17514c4de487d86f97933.jpg?noredirect

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=A7dokUKm,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-20T21:42:48.512+0000)
>
> Blood Moon Diana is not redundant because the thematic is not at all relevant to Diana. 

Right, because adding blood and red effects to her overall Lunar theme isn't close to the original at all and is completely stand alone and unique as a theme.

Come on now.

> [{quoted}](name=Zedex,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=A7dokUKm,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2017-01-20T23:04:51.879+0000)
>
> Right, because adding blood and red effects to her overall Lunar theme isn't close to the original at all and is completely stand alone and unique as a theme.
> 
> Come on now.

Her overall theme is based around Artemis, not Japan. Her costume isn't even remotely close to resembling anything from Japan.

It's not different enough from her base model to warrant a skin. Like how we don't have Nurse Soraka or Dark Star Aurelion Sol. I'd rather see a Blood Moon Leona skin before seeing a Blood Moon Diana one; an alternate reality where Leona worships the moon? Yes, please.

Eclipse Leona and Diana?

Those were fan art concepts produced back when Diana was released. I'm sure somebody probably has the pictures floating around here somewhere. Riot even spotlighted the Leona one.

Talking about these?

http://pre14.deviantart.net/fa78/th/pre/i/2013/070/a/d/league_of_legends__eclipse_diana_by_gisalmeida-d5g53ca.jpg

http://pre03.deviantart.net/8f37/th/pre/f/2013/164/2/5/eclipse_leona_by_sunnykoda-d60dj2t.jpg

Draven {{champion:119}} 

(Yes, I know the joke.)

Or Freijlord {{champion:22}}.

**Oh wait...**

They always release more than 1 Blood Moon skin. We have confirmation on Jhin. We don't know who else is getting one. Also, I highly, highly doubt Cassiopeia will get a Blood Moon skin. Cassiopeia already has a heavily Asian themed skin in Jade Fang - there would be a lot of thematic overlap with that skin and a Blood Moon skin.

>They always release more than 1 Blood Moon skin. We have confirmation on Jhin.

...Please tell me you are joking :|

http://img03.deviantart.net/d563/i/2016/058/5/a/blood_moon_diana_please__by_farahboom-d9tb8p6.jpg http://i.imgur.com/ZxwFSP0.jpg
Too bad it's not 100% true in the comic, as Zilean, Kalista, Thresh and Elise have them as well and they are not related to Ionia.

But Udyr _assisted_ Ionia (edit), and he's friends with Nidalee, and Nidalee got mistaken for Kalista here:

http://66.media.tumblr.com/b120de5f46bdb57264675ac660668a3c/tumblr_nel8cswtv51shiin5o1_1280.jpg

So outside winning the most absurd relations post of the week (help me out here, please), there's always possibilities that Elise and Thresh also have some previous Ionian relations!

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/946/735/a0a.jpg

*ahem*

Udyr is freljordian.
She was only mistaken clearly cause Rengar needs brains xD
Hate to say it, but Diana also has an Asian themed skin. She got one for Lunar Revel a few years ago.

> [{quoted}](name=TheyCallMeJinx,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=A7dokUKm,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-01-20T21:45:15.952+0000)
>
> Hate to say it, but Diana also has an Asian themed skin. She got one for Lunar Revel a few years ago.

Oh, I wasn't aware that was Lunar Revel since it was available year round. I thought it was based on Artemis.
Some people are thinking it's Jhin and Yorick, Jhin cuz' it's obvious and Yorick because the arch looks kinda' like the thing on his back, plus it has black mist clinging to it.

> [{quoted}](name=Tattersall,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=A7dokUKm,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-01-20T23:03:19.926+0000)
>
> Some people are thinking it's Jhin and Yorick, Jhin cuz' it's obvious and Yorick because the arch looks kinda' like the thing on his back, plus it has black mist clinging to it.

Jhin, I get. But that arch isn't like the one on his back because there's no way to secure it the way it's structured. Plus, the Blood Moon skins have always been characterized by black and red. Giving Yorick a Blood Moon skin would just be super lame and trite.

How come nobody considers Vladimir as a candidate for a Blood Moon skin?

Blood **Moon** Diana.

**Blood** Moon Vladimir.
Time of the month Vladimir!
Those types of jokes arent funny. Period.

Come on, don't B- 

^^
Don't get all vein on me.
{{champion:34}}
Yeah. Blue square doesn't get many skins.
*skin turns it into red square*
Blue Square is such a sad champion... they need more skins ;(
the need to give us the magenta square chroma they promised a year ago.

I think if anyone gets the other Blood Moon skin, it should be Diana. People have been rabid for her to get one since the line began. It would be the bitch slap heard around the world if they gave into fans begging for a BM Jhin and didn't give into the longer running fans begging for BM Diana.
I really hope {{champion:131}} and {{champion:69}}  gets one. but i more think the champs are {{champion:202}}, {{champion:163}}  and {{champion:134}}
Me :3

hopefully yorick gets a blood moon skin

he's long overdue for a skin and blood moon would be the perfect opportunity as a lot of other shadow isles champions already have them

Guess who will never get a skin?



{{champion:83}}
Not really. The speculation is that he is the other skin coming with Jhin.

I came into this thread expecting obligatory {{champion:131}}.

I'm not sure whether to be disappointed or to upvote for the successful troll.

*ahem*
{{champion:26}}
To be fair, Zilean can be anywhere and anywhen, anytime. Whose not to say in an alternate Time line, he resided in Ionia.
Zilean is from Ionia clearly, cause he is from anywhere...anytime.
That's never been stated.
But from the champions that have received them it's kind of clear.
was 100% expecting this to be {{champion:131}}
let all the woman.....bitches be bloody.
{{champion:34}} either, it's Cyan Moon.
You mean Diana
